remarks: Separate the nested sum of the product ` C ( j ) x. D ( k ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsum2mul.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsum2mul.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
fsum2mul.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fsum2mul.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. B ) -> D e. CC ) $.
fsum2mul $p |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. A sum_ k e. B ( C x. D ) = ( sum_ j e. A C x. sum_ k e. B D ) ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d B j k $.
$d C k $.
$d D j $.
$d j k ph $.
